episode_event_trainersfile_nejiki_datsur: “Rowdy rental Pokémon”?
That’s right.

We have a rental service for Pokémon so
anyone can enjoy battling here.

But a couple of those rental Pokémon refuse to
get along with anyone. They’ve become quite
a handful.
Huh! They sound pretty interesting to me!

Yeah, I’ve got a soft spot for Pokémon with a bit
of pride in ’em.

But it’s concerning when rental Pokémon
have rough dispositions.

Since they’re often paired up with pretty
inexperienced Trainers.
So I wanted to ask you Factory Heads for help.

I’ve heard that the Battle Factory also utilizes
rental Pokémon...

And I figured that the leaders of such a place may
be able to win over these two.
Fine with me!

Rental Pokémon that are hard to handle? Sounds
like fun!

Yeah! Sounds like a great way to put our Factory
Head skills to use!
Really? Thanks, both of ya!
May as well introduce you right now, then.
Wow! They’re just like you said!
I like the look of these two!
Bzweeeeep! Hmm... I see...
I rather like this Magnezone.
That leaves this Ninjask to me, then!
Hey, my name’s Noland! Nice to meet ya, buddy!
Sorry for the trouble. I’ll leave you to it!

A while after Magnezone and Ninjask were left in
Thorton and Noland’s care...
Those are some great Pokémon!

They seem so cooperative...and more
importantly, powerful!

Yes, I’d never have guessed that they were
rental Pokémon!

It’s times like this that make Pokémon battle
facilities so irresistible to me. Whenever I see
one, I can’t help but go inside!
Haha, I understand the feeling!
(Getting the stamp of approval from Champions...)

(I was definitely right to ask those two! It worked,
young master!)
However...
Awww! Please, just LISTEN to me!
Wha—?! Wh-what’s going on?!
Bzweeeeep!

Hmm... I’d say they’ve improved by about, say,
one percent?
You mean...

...they’ve got no intention of obeying any Trainers
other than us?
Hmm... What to do...

Sorry we weren’t able to live up to
your expectations.
No, no, don’t worry about it.

I was just happy to see these two listen to any
Trainers at all.

Actually... I wanted to ask you, Noland and
Thornton...

Would you be willing to take Magnezone and
Ninjask as your partners?
Huh? You wouldn’t mind?

Not at all. Now that they’ve acknowledged your
strength, I think they’d be happier with you than
as rental Pokémon.

Huh, well in that case, we’d be happy to
take ’em!

Hmm... I’d say our affinity is around, say, one
hundred percent?
